name: 2089: Space Divided
storyline:
Collect resources:
Use workers to gather resources to keep your war machine running.

Build your base:
Use your workers to build up your defences and production buildings. Use turrets for border defence and factories to produce units for attack.

Produce troops:
Build an army of different troops that are ready for any opponent.

Be smarter than your opponent:
Use highly intelligent tactics to counter your opponent and gain an advantage.
summary:
2089 - Space Divided is a science fiction real-time strategy game in which you collect resources, build up your base,
raise troops and destroy your opponents with tactical finesse.
